Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: Kiko Guide
Description:
Comprehensive guides for duty content such as Dungeons, Trials and Alliance Raids.

Key features:
- Automatically open a guide when entering a duty
- Neat boss mechanic tables
- A shortend strategy mode for easy reading
- Anti-spoiler protections
- Built in guide editor
& more to come!
Punchline: The ultimate guidebook for in-game duties, great for sprouts & daily roulettes!
